title: BMaaS — 03 Network Fabric Monitoring V6
description: GPU NVLink health (gpu_nvlink_* metrics), managed switches, InfiniBand per-port MLX5, system network I/O, NIC details.

panels.title: GPU NVLink Health per Entity
panels.description:
WHY: NVLink health per DGX node — 0 = all links healthy, > 0 = degraded.

METRIC: gpu_health_nvlink — DCGM NVLink health check.
SIGNIFICANCE: Unhealthy NVLink = reduced multi-GPU bandwidth → training slowdown.
ACTION: > 0 → check NVLink cables, NVSwitch on affected node.

panels.title: Managed Switches UP
panels.description:
WHY: External ToR/spine switches connect DGX nodes to data center network.

METRIC: managed_switches_up.
SIGNIFICANCE: DOWN = node(s) isolated from network.

panels.title: Managed Switches DOWN
panels.description:
WHY: Network switch failure = node isolation.

METRIC: managed_switches_down.
ACTION: > 0 = check switch, cables, config.

panels.title: Managed Switches Closed
panels.description:
WHY: CLOSED = intentionally taken offline for maintenance.

METRIC: managed_switches_closed.
NOTE: Normal during infrastructure changes.

panels.title: Managed Switches Total
panels.description:
WHY: Baseline count for network fabric.

METRIC: managed_switches_total.

panels.title: GPU NVLink CRC Data Errors
panels.description:
WHY: CRC errors = data integrity failures on NVLink interconnect.

METRIC: gpu_nvlink_crc_data_errors — cumulative CRC error count.
ACTION: Rising = cable or connector degrading. Reseat or replace.

panels.title: GPU NVLink CRC Flit Errors
panels.description:
WHY: Flit = smallest NVLink transfer unit. Flit CRC = link-level noise.

METRIC: gpu_nvlink_crc_flit_errors.
SIGNIFICANCE: Lower severity than data errors but indicates link quality.

panels.title: GPU NVLink Total Bandwidth
panels.description:
WHY: Verify NVLink fabric is delivering expected throughput.

METRIC: gpu_nvlink_total_bandwidth — aggregate NVLink BW.
SIGNIFICANCE: B200 NVLink expected ~900GB/s per GPU pair.

panels.title: GPU Fabric Status
panels.description:
WHY: Shows if each GPU is part of the NVLink domain.

METRIC: GPU_fabric_status — 0 = included, > 0 = excluded.
ACTION: Excluded GPU loses multi-GPU capability.

panels.title: GPU NVLink Health Trend
panels.description:
WHY: Track NVLink health over time — detect degradation patterns.

METRIC: gpu_health_nvlink.
SIGNIFICANCE: Periodic spikes = intermittent cable issue.

panels.title: IB Link State (All Ports)
panels.description:
WHY: InfiniBand link state shows port connectivity.

METRIC: infiniband_mlx5_*_link_state — 5=LinkUp, 1=Down.
SIGNIFICANCE: All ports should be 5 (LinkUp) for full IB bandwidth.

panels.title: IB Link Downed Count
panels.description:
WHY: Each link-down event = network disruption for running jobs.

METRIC: infiniband_mlx5_*_link_downed — cumulative flap counter.
ACTION: Rising = cable/HCA issue. Reseat or replace.

panels.title: IB Port Rate
panels.description:
WHY: Verify negotiated link speed matches expected (400Gbps ConnectX-7).

METRIC: infiniband_mlx5_*_rate.
ACTION: Lower-than-expected = cable quality issue or port config.

panels.title: IB Physical State
panels.description:
WHY: Physical layer state — 5=LinkUp, 2=Polling (trying to connect).

METRIC: infiniband_mlx5_*_phys_state.
SIGNIFICANCE: Stuck in Polling = cable/port mismatch.

panels.title: System Bytes Recv / Sent
panels.description:
WHY: System-level network throughput for data plane.

METRICS: bytes_recv + bytes_sent.

panels.title: IP Traffic
panels.description:
WHY: IP-level traffic volume — overall network usage.

METRICS: ip_in_receives + ip_out_requests.

panels.title: TCP Retransmissions
panels.description:
WHY: TCP retransmits indicate network congestion or packet loss.

METRIC: tcp_retrans_segs.
ACTION: Sustained high = check switch buffering, cable quality.

panels.title: NIC Speed
panels.description:
WHY: Verify link speed negotiation.

METRIC: sys_class_net_speed — per-interface link speed (Mbps).
EXPECTED: 400000 for 400GbE, 100000 for 100GbE.

panels.title: NIC MTU
panels.description:
WHY: Jumbo frames (MTU 9000) required for IB and high-perf networking.

METRIC: sys_class_net_mtu.

panels.title: NIC Carrier Changes
panels.description:
WHY: Each carrier change = link flap = disruption.

METRIC: sys_class_net_carrier_changes — per-NIC flap counter.

panels.title: Frame Errors
panels.description:
WHY: NIC hardware errors — bad cables, driver issues.

METRIC: frame_errors.
ACTION: > 0 = investigate NIC, cable, firmware.
